body_html:
Here is the code that patches all the functions in the tf.nn as methods of the Builder class, just so you have a taste of the kind of code involved

import tensorflow as tf
import tensorbuilder as tb
import inspect

for _f_name, f in inspect.getmembers(tf.nn, inspect.isfunction):
    tb.Builder.register_map_method(f, "tensorflow.nn")

Here is the code that patches all the functions in the tf.nn as methods of the Builder class, just so you have a taste of the kind of code involved
import tensorflow as tf

import inspect

for _f_name, f in inspect.getmembers(tf.nn, inspect.isfunction):
    tb.Builder.register_map_method(f, "tensorflow.nn")
body:
Here is the code that patches all the functions in the `tf.nn` as methods of the `Builder` class, just so you have a taste of the kind of code involved

```
import tensorflow as tf
import tensorbuilder as tb
import inspect

for _f_name, f in inspect.getmembers(tf.nn, inspect.isfunction):
    tb.Builder.register_map_method(f, "tensorflow.nn")
```
